com.ibm.team.workitem.common
Interface IAuditableCommonProcess

public interface IAuditableCommonProcess

Representation of the team process on both the client and the server.

See IClientProcess for documentation on operations that are forwarded to on the client side.

Since:
0.5

getContributorsWithRole

IContributorHandle[] getContributorsWithRole(IContributorHandle[] contributors,
                                             IProcessArea processArea,
                                             java.lang.String[] roleIds,
                                             org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor)
                                             throws TeamRepositoryException
Given a set of contributors, returns all contributors that have at least one of the given roles assigned relative to the given area.

Parameters:
contributors - - the set of contributors
processArea - - the process area
roleIds- - the roles
monitor -
Returns:
all contributors from the given set of contributors that have at least one of the roles assigned relative to the given area
Throws:
TeamRepositoryException - in case this operation fails
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - in case the given process area not covered by this process
Since:
4.0

getPermittedActions

boolean[] getPermittedActions(IProcessArea processArea,
                              java.lang.String operationId,
                              java.lang.String[] actions,
                              org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor)
                              throws TeamRepositoryException
Queries whether the current user has permissions to perform each of the given actions relative to the given process area. Each entry in the returned array specifies whether the user has permissions for the corresponding action in the given array.

Note that this method only works for team operations. For project operations, use IAuditableCommonProcess.getPermittedActions(String, String[], IProgressMonitor) instead.

Parameters:
processArea - the process area
operationId - the identifier of the operation
actions - the collection of actions to consider
monitor - the progress monitor or null
Returns:
an array of booleans which specifies whether each of the given actions are permitted
Throws:
TeamRepositoryException
Since:
4.0.1

getPermittedActions

boolean[] getPermittedActions(java.lang.String projectOperationId,
                              java.lang.String[] actions,
                              org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor)
                              throws TeamRepositoryException
Queries whether the current user has permissions to perform each of the given actions for the given project operation. Each entry in the returned array specifies whether the user has permissions for the corresponding action in the given array.

Note that this method only works for team operations. For project operations, use IAuditableCommonProcess.getPermittedActions(IProcessArea, String, String[], IProgressMonitor) instead.

Parameters:
projectOperationId - the identifier of the project operation
actions - the collection of actions to consider
monitor - the progress monitor or null
Returns:
an array of booleans which specifies whether each of the given actions are permitted
Throws:
TeamRepositoryException
Since:
4.0.1
